caption.title: Percentage viral suppression in persons with HIV and estimated HIV incidence in 2010 and 2015, United States.
caption.p: The subset includes 30 jurisdictions (29 states and the District of Columbia) with viral suppression data available for 3 years or more. Estimated HIV incidence rate and percent viral suppression categories were determined by quartiles calculated across the entire time frame 2010â€“15.
